article.headline: Hofstra 64, Delaware 58
article.story: HEMPSTEAD, N.Y. (AP) -- Antoine Agudio had 26 points, Charles Jenkins added 20 and Hofstra beat Delaware 64-58 on Saturday. Marc Egerson's 26 points -- 18 in the first half -- led the Blue Hens (9-12, 6-5 Colonial Athletic Association), who led 34-25 at halftime. After Egerson's dunk gave the visitors a 48-40 lead with 11:38 to go, the Pride (7-14, 4-7) went on an 11-2 run to take a 51-50 advantage at 6:12 on two free throws by Nathaniel Lester. Agudio put Hofstra ahead for good, 53-52, with a jumper that started a game-ending 13-6 run.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
